title: Polki Chandbali Jhumka - A Timeless Telugu Heritage
features: This exquisite Chandbali Jhumka features meticulously set uncut Polki diamonds, showcasing the traditional 'kundan' setting. The concentric circle design and the teardrop pendant create an elegant dangle effect. Finished with an authentic Hyderabadi polish for a rich, antique sheen.
occasions: and festive occasions like Diwali or Ugadi. Perfect for adding a touch of traditional elegance to modern ensembles. Suitable for Seemantham or other significant ceremonies.
description: This Chandbali Jhumka embodies the rich heritage of Telugu jewelry craftsmanship. The use of uncut Polki diamonds, hand-selected for their brilliance, makes each piece unique. The Hyderabadi polish imparts a timeless appeal, ensuring this heirloom-quality piece will be treasured for generations. The design seamlessly blends traditional aesthetics with modern wearability.
